import Topbar from "../Topbar/Topbar"; import React, {useEffect, useRef, useState} from "react"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import './VacanciesAdd.css' import axios from "axios"; function VacanciesAdd() { const [deps, setDeps] = useState([]) const [user, setUser] = useState([]) const department = useRef() useEffect(() => { const getDeps = async () => { const deps = await axios.get('/api/departments/') setDeps(deps.data) const user = await axios.get('/api/user/') setUser(user.data) } getDeps() }, []) return ( <>
